settings.text: Our shops are dedicated to providing each individual with highly personalized attention no matter what your needs in order to ensure the best angling experience possible. We are able to achieve and guarantee this level of service because we maintain a highly educated and helpful staff, and offer you the finest selection in fly fishing gear, tackle, and accessories. Whether you are looking for fly tackle, or just need information on the local waters and a few flies to get you started, let our staff offer you the best knowledge available. If you can’t stop by the shop's give us a call and we would be happy to assist you with any fly fishing needs.

settings.title: St. Peter's Old Town
settings.text:
Located in a Victorian home from the 1800’s, St. Peter’s Fly Shop provides a very unique environment for our customers and is a must stop for all anglers visiting Colorado's Front Range. Loaded with the best fly selection.

St. Peters Old Town
202 Remington St.
Ft. Collins, CO. 80524
970-498-8968

settings.title: St. Peter's South
settings.text:
Located on the South Side of Fort Collins, our South location is a full service fly shop servicing our customers in Southern Fort Collins, Windsor, Greeley, and Loveland. The south store is a great stop for those headed to the Big Thompson, Rocky Mountain National Park, or any of our warmwater lakes.

St. Peter's South
2008 E. Harmony Rd.
Ft. Collins, CO. 80528
970-377-3785
